text: Kamen Rider Revice is a Japanese tokusatsu drama Kamen Rider Series. Super Hero Time joined Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger and later, Avataro Sentai Donbrothers. ==Cast== * Ikki Igarashi / Kamen Rider Revi: Kentaro Maeda * Vice / Kamen Rider Vice (Voice), Himself (30, 31): Subaru Kimura * Daiji Igarashi / Kamen Rider Live, Kagero / Kamen Rider Evil: Wataru Hyuga * Sakura Igarashi / Kamen Rider Jeanne: Ayaka Imoto * George Karizaki / Kamen Rider Demons: Noritaka Hamao * Aguilera / Queen Bee Deadman, Hana Natsuki / Kamen Rider Aguilera: Yui Asakura * Otreca / Kamen Rider Demons / Kamen Rider Otreca: Hayata Seki * Julio: Kurodo Hachijoin * Hiromi Kadota / Kamen Rider Demons: Junya Komatsu * Hikaru Ushijima / Kamen Rider Over-Demons: Tomoya Oku * Shōkō Irabu: Yutaka Saigoh * Lovekov (Voice), Himself (31): Miku Itō * Vail (Voice), Demons Driver: Kenjiro Tsuda * Masumi Karizaki (Voice): Shinshu Fuji * Yūjirō Wakabayashi, Chameleon Deadman: Kazuya Tanabe * Tasuke Ushijima: Toshihiro Yoshiba * Hideo Akaishi: Jun Hashimoto * Yumiki Igarashi: Kurara Emi * Genta Igarashi / Kamen Rider Vail / Kamen Rider Destream: Shigeyuki Totsugi * Revice, Live/Evil, Jeanne Equipment Voice, Vistamp Voice: Shingo Fujimori ===Guests=== * Yasushi Kudō (6, 13-15): Gamon Kaai * Scammers (9, 10): Hiroya Matsumoto, Mizuki Saiba * Scammer (9, 10, 50): Tetsuji Sakakibara * Amahiko Haitani (11-15): Shuji Kashiwabara * Chigusa Yamagiri (19, 20): Kazusa Okuyama * Tatsuhiko Tabuchi (19, 20): Kiyotaka Oji * Koji "Zico" Ikeyama (30, 31): Hideki Sakata * Himself (30): Kenichi Suzumura * Himself (31): Hiroshi Kamiya * Himself (31): Ryō Horikawa * Ace Ukiyo (50): Hideyoshi Kan ===Beyond Generations=== * Takeshi Hongo / Kamen Rider 1: Maito Fujioka * Ryunosuke Momose / Kamen Rider Century: Akiyoshi Nakao * Hideo Momose / Kamen Rider Century: Arata Furuta ===Rider Legacy: Kamen Rider Vail=== * Genta Igarashi / Kamen Rider Vail: Masanari Wada * Yumiki Igarashi: Sakurako Okubo * Agariyama: Mitsu Murata * Noah armed forces leader: Yuki Torigoe ===Hyper Battle DVD=== * Kenta Katagiri: Ren Kondō ==Theme songs== ; Opening theme * "liveDevil" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: MUSOH, STEVEN LEE, SLIPKID, Sota Hanamura ** Arrangement: STEVEN LEE ** Add Arrangement: Hiroyuki Fujino ** Artist: Da-ice feat. Subaru Kimura ; Insert themes * "Go with the flo" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: Kōtarō Nakagawa ** Arrangement: tatsuso ** Artist: Ikki, Daiji, & Sakura Igarashi (Kentaro Maeda, Wataru Hyuga, & Ayaka Imoto) ** Episodes: 16 * "VOLCANO" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: tatsuso ** Artist: Ikki Igarashi & Vice (Kentaro Maeda & Subaru Kimura) ** Episodes: 17 * "#GekiyaVice" ("#Awesome Vice") ** Lyrics: Bintaro Cola ** Composition: tatsuo ** Artist: Vice (Subaru Kimura) ** Episodes: 29 * "Without You" ** Performed by: Ikki Igarashi & Hiromi Kadota (Kentaro Maeda & Junya Komatsu) * "My Dream" ** Performed by: Yukimi Igarashi (Kurara Emi & Sakurako Okubo) * "Riot in Bloom" ** Performed by: Hana Natsuki (Yui Asakura) Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2021 television series debuts Category:2022 television series endings
title: Kamen Rider Revice
